item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ qinhe
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09HJR2GBB

【Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection】: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ​Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
【Interactive Training Small Dog Toys】: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
【Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys】: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
【Quality Gifts And Service】: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!


KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !




4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

  • Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

  • Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

  • Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

Product Description

18 UNITS DOG TOYS FOR PUPPIES AND SMALL DOGS.

Bestdoggo Super Value Toys Pack for Dogs, Help Your Dog Get More Fun, and Protect Your Home.

Dog loves to chew thing, especially puppy, they love to chew around when they feel lonely or teeth growing, give your dog our dog toy, let them play with the toy, not your shoes, clothes, underwear, or furniture.

Dogs love our toy, it’s a great gift for your beloved dogs.

Why do you need our toys?

Building relationship

You can play fetch or hiding game with your dog, it’s a great way to build relationship with your dog, makes your dog loves you more!

Teeth cleaning

No-toxic material rubber toy is a good toy for puppies and small dogs to chew.

Durable and fun to play with

18 pcs durable dog toys, it’s multifarious and colorful, your dog will love our toys.

Easy to wash

Our toys are washable.

18 pcs in one bag, one time purchase with long last.

Quantity
18 Units 7 Units 6 Units 1 Units

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.79 x 9.53 x 3.94 inches; 1.43 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 3, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bestdoggo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09V26ML4B

【Safe and High Quality】Great interactive and training toy, you can play fetch and hiding game with your dog, enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.Build energy and health, helps dog solve boredom and anxiety separation, protect furniture from dog chewing.
【Great for Dental Health】Clean teeth, clean your dog’s teeth, make your dog healthier, by chewing the rubber toys and rope toys, dog could get gum massage and stress relief.
【Design for Small Dogs and Puppies】Premium material with built-in squeaker, no glue and non-toxic material, safe and fun, great for puppies.【NOTE!】NOT for aggressive chew dogs, our toys designed for puppies small and medium-sized dog.
【Service from Us】We are so certain that your dog will love these small dog toys. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.
【NOTE!】Please note! These toys set is not suitable for large dogs, aggressive dogs. The toys cannot be eaten. No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged. At the same time, we suggest that the owner pay attention to the damage of the puppy toy in time.

GREAT CHOICE FOR YOUR PETS – IMMCUTE Pet Training and Puppy PadsA clean and fresh-smelling home that every pet parent and dog deserves. IMMCUTE pet training pads are ideal for puppies and dogs that stay indoors for long periods of time.All-day ProtectionIt can provide all-day protection for the puppy or senior dog potty training, making your cleanup a breeze and saving you much time.Made of High-quality Materials

  • Non-woven Fabrics
  • Tissue Paper
  • Super Absorbent Polymer (SAP)
  • Fluff Pulp
  • Tissue Paper
  • Waterproof Polyethylene (PE Film)

IMMCUTE dog pee pads are made of high-quality materials, more durable than most pet training pads on the market.6-layer ProtectionThe 6-layer protection technology makes it super absorbent and leak-proof to protect your floors or carpets by preventing leaks. And the absorbent polymer layer instantly turns liquid into a gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.Multiple UsesThe puppy pads usually placed in pet crates or kennels, pet pad holders, paper boxes, or put under the dog bowl or on the car backseat to keep clean.Not Only for Dogs, But Also for Other PetsOur pee pads/potty pads are oriented to a wide range of animals, not just for dogs but also for other pets, like kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, squirrels, etc.Note:

  • Please measure and determine the size you need before purchasing.
  • Please allow 0-0.4″ error due to manual measurement.
  • Always remember to dispose of soiled dog potty pads and replace them as needed.

【SUPER ABSORBENT & THICKER】Thickened wee wee pads for dogs and 6-layer protection design makes our XL dog pee pee pads more absorbent than the most puppy potty pads on the market.
【QUICK-DRYING】Unique flash-dry technology quickly turns liquid into gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.
【LEAK-PROOF】Each pet training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks for 24 hours.
【ALL DAY PROTECTION】Our puppy pads pet training pads are a great solution for multi-dog homes and pets that need to stay inside for a long period of time.
【XLARGE SIZE】28″ W x 34″ L(71.1cm x 86.4cm).Our magic pee pads are perfect for puppies, senior or sick dogs, kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks and other pets. Not only for your indoor use but also for outdoor use (especially use during travel or the leisure time on the lawn).

4.5

Luciphia was founded with a clear purpose – for your best pet friends.

House training your pet can be simple when utilizing the benefits of the Indoor, Artificial Grass Puppy Pad by PETMAKER. This fake grass bathroom mat and tray is designed to accommodate the potty training needs of puppies, along with the needs of small to medium sized pets that are unable to make it outside for any reason. The portable pet pad and tray system allows your cat or dog to have an acceptable place to relieve themselves, which ensures a cleaner house, apartment, or patio. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of PETMAKER and ONLY Indoor. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. PETMAKER is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
DOG GRASS PAD WITH TRAY – This artificial turf dog pee pad provides a sanitary place for your pet to relieve themselves inside or on your balcony or patio. It’s a reusable alternative to disposable dog training pads for small to medium-sized pets.
EASY PUPPY TRAINING – Potty training your new best friend just got easier, even if you live in an apartment or work long hours. This dog grass pad helps avoid accidents while enforcing your pup’s training that they should go potty on grass.
THREE-LAYER SYSTEM – The artificial dog grass mat sits on top of a secure plastic drainage insert that allows liquid to empty into the durable collection puppy pad holder to avoid messes and spills.
EASY CLEAN-UP – Cleaning this reusable grass pad for dogs is quick and easy. Rinse the three layers of the dog potty tray with soapy water and clean-up is complete.
PRODUCT DETAILS – Materials: Synthetic Plastic (Grass Mat) and Hard Plastic (Tray and Insert). Dimensions: (L) 25” x (W) 20” x (H) 1.25”. Color: Green and Black.

Read more

3-Piece System

Synthetic Plastic Grass Mat

Grass mat looks and feels just like real grass while being completely safe and non-toxic for your pet.

Detachable Grid Tray

Holes from the detachable grid tray allows liquid to drain to the bottom base tray, so grass mat is always dry and ready for use.

Bottom Base Tray

Bottom base tray detaches from grid tray for an easy and mess free clean up. Simply rinse and wash with soap and water.

Set Include:

  • Grass Mat
  • Grid Tray
  • Base Tray
  • Dimensions: 20 x 25 x 1.25 inches
  • Indoor and Outdoor Use

Read more

Place potty trainer tray in any room in the house!

Great for apartments or homes with no available yards.

Perfect for any patio, porch, or garage!

Read more

4

House training your pet can be simple when utilizing the benefits of the Indoor, Artificial Grass Puppy Pad by PETMAKER. This fake grass bathroom mat and tray is designed to accommodate the potty training needs of puppies, along with the needs of small to medium sized pets that are unable to make it outside for any reason. The portable pet pad and tray system allows your cat or dog to have an acceptable place to relieve themselves, which ensures a cleaner house, apartment, or patio. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of PETMAKER and ONLY Indoor. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. PETMAKER is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
DOG GRASS PAD WITH TRAY – This artificial turf dog pee pad provides a sanitary place for your pet to relieve themselves inside or on your balcony or patio. It’s a reusable alternative to disposable dog training pads for small to medium-sized pets.
EASY PUPPY TRAINING – Potty training your new best friend just got easier, even if you live in an apartment or work long hours. This dog grass pad helps avoid accidents while enforcing your pup’s training that they should go potty on grass.
THREE-LAYER SYSTEM – The artificial dog grass mat sits on top of a secure plastic drainage insert that allows liquid to empty into the durable collection puppy pad holder to avoid messes and spills.
EASY CLEAN-UP – Cleaning this reusable grass pad for dogs is quick and easy. Rinse the three layers of the dog potty tray with soapy water and clean-up is complete.
PRODUCT DETAILS – Materials: Synthetic Plastic (Grass Mat) and Hard Plastic (Tray and Insert). Dimensions: (L) 25” x (W) 20” x (H) 1.25”. Color: Green and Black.

Read more

3-Piece System

Synthetic Plastic Grass Mat

Grass mat looks and feels just like real grass while being completely safe and non-toxic for your pet.

Detachable Grid Tray

Holes from the detachable grid tray allows liquid to drain to the bottom base tray, so grass mat is always dry and ready for use.

Bottom Base Tray

Bottom base tray detaches from grid tray for an easy and mess free clean up. Simply rinse and wash with soap and water.

Set Include:

  • Grass Mat
  • Grid Tray
  • Base Tray
  • Dimensions: 20 x 25 x 1.25 inches
  • Indoor and Outdoor Use
